data.text:
Food Safety Report: Pizza 73, Saddletowne Circle Northeast, Calgary, AB, Canada

4 years ago •reported by user-rtbxp213 • business

600 Saddletowne Circle Northeast, Calgary, T3J 5M1 Alberta, Canada

Ordered a pizza and wings, after eating I was completely fine later that same day I was having the worst stomach cramps and had diarrhea twice in the span of 30 minutes. Still on the toilet currently while writing this. | Symptoms: Diarrhea, Nausea, Cramps

Recent Interesting Reports

Screwball Peanut Butter Whiskey recalled due to undeclared allergen

1 week ago •source foodstandards.gov.au • details

Recall notice

Pernod Ricard Winemakers Pty Ltd is recalling its Screwball Peanut Butter Whiskey Flavoured Liqueur, due to an undeclared allergen, specifically sesame. The products have been sold nationally at Dan Murphy’s, BWS, independent liquor retailers including IGA, and on premise outlets.

The recall involves all batches of the… See more

Cabo Bob's Burritos, Rio Grande Street, Austin, TX, USA

2 weeks ago •reported by user-pdkkv948 • details

Ordered a chicken burrito via DoorDash. Something about the avocado (guacamole) tasted wrong, but I thought it might have just been the salsa flavor. Turns out the avocado was fermented. Felt feverish a few hours later and threw up that night. | Symptoms: Vomiting, Fever

Pak Choi, ALDI, Scott Rd, Luton LU3 3BF, UK

3 weeks ago •reported by user-nxxxx875 • details

bought 2 packs of pachoi and only the food we ate 2days ago my wife got all the symptoms after 1 hour and I ate little bit of pachoi vege and feel medium symptoms of the poisoning we still got another pack of pachoi in the fridge | Symptoms: Diarrhea, Vomiting, Stomach Pain, Fever, Cramps, Chills, Headache

Subco Foods Syrup recalled due to Microbiological Activity

2 weeks ago •source accessdata.fda.gov • details

Recall notice

SUBCO Foods Inc. has voluntarily recalled two of its syrup products due to potential food-borne illness risks. Customer complaint for bloated bottles. Testing and examination of these lots has revealed they did not meet specifications, including elevated pH and water activity levels. This may be indicative of… See more

Chicken breast steak recalled due to Salmonella

4 weeks ago •source potravinynapranyri.cz • details

Recall notice

In a recent inspection at Tesco Stores CR in Tachov, Czech Republic, a batch of chicken breast steak was found to be contaminated with the pathogenic bacterium Salmonella Infantis. This bacterium can cause salmonellosis, a disease that can lead to severe gastrointestinal symptoms. The contaminated sample was… See more

Carl's Jr, Culiacan Airport, Culiacan, Sin., Mexico

4 weeks ago •reported by user-pfkph691 • details

Suspected food poisoning. Symptoms: Diarrhea, Nausea, Vomiting, Fever, Stomach Pain, Chills

Suspected source: A hamburger at Carls Jr.

Onset: 4 to 12 hours

Duration: Several days

Sick: Yo

Additional information: I would just like Salubridad to do its job and inspect these types of fast food restaurants… See more

Store packed Albacore Tuna Loin recalled due to Histamine Levels

4 weeks ago •source rappel.conso.gouv.fr • details

Recall notice

Super U Soual has voluntarily recalled its store-packaged Longe de Thon Albacore due to the presence of histamine. The recalled product was sold in Soual through Super U in France

The recalled product is:

- Albacore Tuna Loin

- Packaged by the store.

- The product has… See more

Chef Boyardee, Walmart Supercenter, Glacier Drive, Saint Croix Falls, WI, USA

1 week ago •reported by user-wtpt3566 • details

I ate some chef boyardee mini ravioli on August 3rd. I woke with horrible stomach cramps and started vomiting. I again, ate some chef boyardee ravioli on August 15th, not even think that is why I was sick on the 3rd. The same thing happened, I woke up with horrible cramps. I started vomiting. | Symptoms: Nausea, Vomiting, Stomach Pain, Cramps, Chills, Headache

Chick-fil-A, Monticello Avenue, Norfolk, VA, USA

1 day ago •reported by user-nvmz3426 • details

I ordered breakfast from the Chic-fil-a on Monticello Blvd around 9am today. I got a 10 piece chicken minis, hash browns, and a large coke. About 1hr later I was experiencing stomach pain and making frequent trips to the bathroom. | Symptoms: Diarrhea, Stomach Pain
